means: 坐落( stand的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He finished his conversation and stood up, looking straight at me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说完话站起来，直视着我。

sentence.Network_en: He stood emotionless as he heard the judge pass sentence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他面无表情地站在那里，听法官宣布判决。

sentence.Network_en: She stood preening in their midst, delighted with the attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 她得意洋洋地站在他们中间，为受人瞩目而高兴。

PerfectNetExp.abs: you stood there right beside me ., 你就站在那里 , 就在我身边.
英语不规则动词归类记忆表星沙英语网 ... told 告诉 stood 站 bear 生.
高中英语不规则动词分类速记 - 豆丁网 ... （惯坏）→ spoilt→spoilt stand （站立）→ stood→stood stick （粘住）→ stuck→stuck swe…
uprose ; and gazing i stood long , all mazed., 我长久地站着 , 凝望着 , 直至晕眩.

list.abs: She stood watching the performance from the wings ., 她站在舞台上的侧面观看演出.
wang lin and li ping both stood up ., 王林和李平都站了起来.
When he heard the charge , he stood up and flung out ., 当他听到那项指控时 , 他站起身 , 气冲冲地走了.
He stood within five steps of me ., 他站在离我不到五步远的地方.
While I stood there nobody passed by ., 当我站在那里时 , 没有人经过.

entry.def: Stood is the past tense and past participle of stand.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Grant later said he stood by his claim.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr Grant later said he stood by his claim.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Grant later said he stood by his claim.

auth_sentence.content: For a time the US stood by President Saleh.
auth_sentence.res_content: For a time the US stood by President Saleh.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For a time the US stood by President Saleh.

auth_sentence.content: They stood out in the Members' tea room.
auth_sentence.res_content: They stood out in the Members' tea room.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They stood out in the Members' tea room.

Sentence.sentence: He stood out in three ways－as a technologist, as a corporate （公司的）leader and as somebody who was able to make people love what had previously been impersonal, functional gadgets.
